original_title: UFC on ESPN 30: Barboza vs. Chikadze
overview: UFC on ESPN 30: Barboza vs. Chikadze was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on August 28, 2021 at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States. A featherweight bout between Edson Barboza and Giga Chikadze headlined the event.
title: UFC on ESPN 30: Barboza vs. Chikadze
